violations.message: I need to read the parent class `IPConfig` to understand the full inheritance chain and check for violations.Let me read the local file to check the parent class:FAIL: Line 14-23: Implicit Defaults in Optional - all fields use Field(default=...) pattern for optional types which masks the distinction between None-as-value and None-as-not-set; Line 43-54: Attribute Access or Operator - uses `self.port or 22`, `self.compression or False`, `self.timeout or 30` which masks legitimate falsy values (port=0, compression=False explicitly set)
